Title: Zig, Parser Combinators - and Why They're Awesome
Description: In this article we will be exploring what parser combinators are, what runtime parser generation is - why they’re useful, and then walking through a Zig implementation of them.

Title: netaddr.IP: a new IP address type for Go
Description: The Go standard library's net.IP type is problematic for a number of reasons. We wrote a new one.

Title: New Software Project Checklist
Description: A client I'm working with wanted a set of initial decisions and questions their team should address as they begin a new project. I did a bit of research, thinking surely such a list must exist already, but I didn't find one I liked. So I made an open source one and put it on GitHub.

Title: Mitigating leaked personal access tokens (PATs) found on GitHub public repositories | Azure DevOps Blog
Description: Personal access tokens (PATs) make it easy to integrate your tools with Azure DevOps or extend Azure DevOps functionality for your business needs. However, like other authentication credentials, personal access tokens need to be stored securely. Leaked tokens could compromise your Azure DevOps account and data,

Title: ASMBLR - BuiltWithDot.Net
Description: ASMBLR is an assembly inspired language, intended to help teach core programming. Dealing in simple 2 or 3 letter commands, like (ad)d for adding 2 variables, the language will also create variables implicitly, without type specification.

Title: Home Assistant, Pwned Passwords and Security Misconceptions

Title: Decomposing CRUD to a Task Based UI
